summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3590 , for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest, from Fauntleroy Avenue to West Holly Street, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 44268 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
